title: Peloton: Don’t Blame Us for What Happened in ‘And Just Like That…’ (Spoilers Ahead)
sub_head: Company got good product placement in the first episode of the ‘Sex and the City’ revival, but was just as surprised as viewers at the plotline
body:
Spoiler alert: Mr. Big dies in the “Sex and the City” reboot.
Surprised? So was Peloton Interactive Inc . , according to a company spokeswoman.
